greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Maximal digit in base-3 expansion of n.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = 2 if n == 2 (mod 3), a(1)=1, otherwise a(n) = a(floor(n/3)). - _Robert Israel_, Aug 11 2017
mathematica: Join[{0}, gl[n_] := Module[{idn = IntegerDigits[n, 3]}, Max[idn]]; Array[gl,100]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 12 2017 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 13 2011, based on a suggestion from _Marc LeBrun_.
